backend/main.mo: Marketplace canister with access control, user and seller profiles, and listing management logic.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference.
frontend/.env: Environment variables for site verification and public base URL.
frontend/.env.example: Template showing required environment variable fields for deployment.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template with SEO tags, JSON‑LD, and runtime fallback for public URL.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots rules allowing all crawlers and referencing sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing three main routes with metadata.
frontend/public/static-html-example.html: Standalone static HTML demo page served directly from /public.
frontend/scripts/generate-sitemap.mjs: Node script generating sitemap.xml using VITE_PUBLIC_URL and predefined routes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with handling for reauth and cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandHe: Shows two branding images: a logo and animated mascot side by side.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: Displays an empty-state message with optional action button and icon.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSt: Simple loading indicator with spinning icon and message.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the global app layout with header, footer, background pattern, and navigation.
frontend/src/components/listings/Categor: Renders category buttons and notifies when a category is selected.
frontend/src/components/listings/ImageUp: Manages up to three image uploads, previews, and removal using data URLs.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Displays a product card with image, title, price, and quantity, triggering click handler.
Form for creating or editing listings with presets, validation, and image uploads.
Shows a grid of listings with loading and empty states and navigation on click.
frontend/src/components/listings/listing: Provides preset listing templates with predefined fields like title, description, and price.
frontend/src/components/sellers/SellerDi: Fetches and displays a seller's display name or a fallback if unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useCreateLi: Mutation hook to create a new listing and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useCreateSe: Mutation hook to create a seller profile and invalidate relevant queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useDeactiva: Mutation hook to deactivate a listing and refresh listing-related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useSaveUser: Mutation hook to save the caller's user profile and refresh it.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useUpdateLi: Mutation hook to update a listing and invalidate related caches.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Query hook fetching the caller's user profile with actor readiness checks.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useIsSeller.t: Query hook checking whether the caller is registered as a seller.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useListingDet: Query hook fetching a single listing by ID when actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useListings.t: Query hook fetching all listings by aggregating listings from all sellers.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMyListings: Query hook fetching listings belonging to the authenticated user's principal.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSellers.ts: Provides a React Query hook to fetch a seller profile using the current actor, returning null on errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with search, category filter, and listing grid using fetched listings.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed listing info, owner actions, copy/share tools, and handles listing deactivation.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays user profile and their listings, prompting profile setup and supporting profile saving.
frontend/src/pages/PublishingSharePage.t: React page for sharing deployment URLs, custom domains, and environment snippets with copy-to-clipboard and validation logic.
frontend/src/pages/SellCreateListingPage: Page for authenticated users to create new listings using a form and mutation, with error handling and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/SellEditListingPage.t: Page allowing listing owners to load, edit, and submit updates to an existing listing with ownership checks.
frontend/src/utils/canisterErrors.ts: Parses backend canister errors and maps them to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/customDomain.ts: Validates custom domain input, normalizes it, blocks unwanted domains, and manages localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/utils/publicUrl.ts: Retrieves the app’s public URL from env vars or window origin, plus the current deployment URL.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, typography, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata and a pending feature request for adding a full e-commerce selling and buying flow. Contains state versioning, summaries, and feature-tracking fields.
